text: Erica Denae Moyers is an American wheelchair basketball player and sitting volleyball player. She played at the 2004 Summer Paralympics, winning a bronze medal. She is from Athens, Alabama. She played wheelchair basketball for the University of Alabama. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American wheelchair basketball players Category:American sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for the United States
title: Erica Moyers
